description: AbstractTransportationSpace is the abstract superclass of transportation objects such as Roads, Tracks, Railways, Waterways or Squares.

properties.name: trafficDirection
properties.description: Indicates the direction of traffic flow relative to the corresponding linear geometry representation.

properties.name: occupancy
properties.description: Provides information on the residency of persons, vehicles, or other moving features in the transportation space.

properties.name: trafficSpace
properties.description: Relates to the traffic spaces that are part of the transportation space.

properties.name: auxiliaryTrafficSpace
properties.description: Relates to the auxiliary traffic spaces that are part of the transportation space.

properties.name: hole
properties.description: Relates to the holes that are part of the transportation space.

properties.name: marking
properties.description: Relates to the markings that are part of the transportation space.

properties.name: lod1MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the transportation space in Level of Detail 1. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the transportation space in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
